name: ATV Simulator
description:
ATV Simulator (also known as All Terrain Vehicle Simulation) is a computer game released for the ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64 and Amstrad CPC by Codemasters.

The goal of the game is to drive your ATV through various courses which you must complete within the time limit without running out of fuel. If you crash your ATV, you can move your man to get back into the vehicle, however it will cost you precious seconds to do so. If you run out time or fuel, it is game over.
